name: echolocation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a process in which animals, for example bats (= small animals with wings that fly at night), find their way in the dark by producing sound waves that echo (= are heard again) when they are reflected off an object: Dolphins locate underwater creatures using echolocation.
